company_commercial_names: colonial court motor inn | colonial court
locations: nz, new zealand, bay of plenty, tauranga, 3110, fifteenth avenue, 92, -37.7081077, 176.1604383
short_description: colonial court motor inn is a motel based in tauranga, new zealand.
long_description: centrally located on 15th ave, we are a five-minute drive into downtown tauranga, a stones throw from qeii centre, squash courts, indoor bowls, also tauranga hospital & citizens club. we know what's important when you're travelling, which is why we offer a variety of modern accommodation options including free wifi, comfy beds, excellent showers and outdoor seating for each unit.
generated_description: colonial court motor inn is a modern accommodation located on 15th ave in tauranga, new zealand. the motel offers a variety of rooms, including 1 and 2-bedroom units, studio units, and houses with multiple bedrooms. it is situated just a five-minute drive from downtown tauranga and is conveniently located near the qeii centre, squash courts, indoor bowls, tauranga hospital, and citizens club. the motel features amenities such as free wi-fi, comfortable beds, excellent showers, outdoor seating, a swimming pool, and bbq areas. it caters to solo travelers, couples, and groups, providing ground-floor entry and ample parking. the motel is known for its friendly service and homely atmosphere, with local art adorning the walls and a focus on comfort and convenience for its guests.
